DataElement.preferredName: Recurrent Disease Cancer Progression First Regional Diagnosis Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the indicator related to a diagnosis of the first regional progression or recurrence.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Recurrent Disease Cancer Progression First Regional Diagnosis
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the initial diagnosis of the return of signs and symptoms of cancer after a period of improvement or an increase in the size of a tumor or spread of cancer restricted to the area of body near the original tumor.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The return of a disease after a period of remission.

Concepts.definition: The return of a disease after a period of remission.

Property.preferredDefinition: The worsening of a cancer over time.:Preceding all others in time or space or degree.:Regional; limited to a particular location or area.:The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.

Concepts.definition: A pathologic process in which alterations at the molecular level result in a more aggressive cytologic and phenotypic profile and clinical course of a malignant neoplasm.
Preceding all others in time or space or degree.
Of or belonging to a broader area or region of the body.

The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms (NCI Glossary).

DataElementConcept.origin: RTOG CRF:Radiation Therapy Oncology Group Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the yes/no/unknown/not applicable indicator that asks whether the patient has been diagnosed with the first distant spread of the cancer since submission of the last follow-up form.

PermissibleValues.value: Not applicable, patient has not been assessed
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Not applicable, patient has not been assessed

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Not applicable, patient has not been assessed
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not applicable, patient has not been assessed
The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.changeDescription: Updated to add NCIt concept relationship. Updated VM Short Name to be the Public ID to be consistent with current convention for VM Short Name - DW 10-03-2022
ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.29 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. ak

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the response criteria (includes RECIST and others) and associated documentation of disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
